title: Dream trips: Northern lights, Trans-Siberian Railway, Santorini | Travel | Travel News and Holiday Deals | | The
text:
THERE are holidays, and then there are trips of a lifetime.
Whether it’s an incredible sunset, an ancient hike or seeing nature at it’s wildest, these are the 10 best dream trips as voted by the users of TripAdvisor .
1. See the Northern Lights
The incredible night show of the aurora borealis can be seen across the countries of Scandinavia on the dark nights between September to March. Colours of pink, yellow and green streak across the sky caused by streams of charged particles from the sun that are directed by the Earth’s magnetic fields towards the polar regions.
The incredible Northern Lights of Lapland. Picture: Kakslauttanen Arctic Resort, Finland Source: Supplied
2. Sleep in an overwater bungalow
The meaning of paradise is often imagined as being in places such as Bora Bora in Tahiti, or the Maldives, where you can stay in luxurious island huts perched over crystal clear water.
3. Admire the sunset over Santorini
It’s thought to be one of the best sunsets in the world. The soaring cliffs of Santorini in the Greek Islands are the perfect spot to sit and watch the sun set over the Mediterranean.
The famous Santorini sunset. Picture: Richard Pinker Source: Supplied
4. Trek the Inca trail to Machu Picchu
It’s one of the world’s most famous hikes, winding up the Inca trail in Peru through the Sacred Valley to the mystical ancient city of Machu Picchu.
The mystical heights of Machu Picchu. Source: Supplied
5. Explore the Galápagos Islands
Known for its incredible biodiversity, many animals here are found nowhere else in the world. It’s moon like landscapes and volcanic islands are examples of nature at its finest.
Ecuador’s Galápagos Islands is like nowhere else on Earth. Source: Getty Images
6. Visit Italy’s Amalfi Coast
Deemed by UNESCO as an outstanding example of a Mediterranean landscape, the Amalfi Coast is as dramatic as it is beautiful.
The Mediterranean colours of the Amalfi Coast. Source: Supplied
7. Photograph the ‘Big Five” on safari
The elephant, lion, buffalo, rhinoceros and leopard are known as the “Big Five” on safari and are considered the ultimate animals to spot in Africa.
8. Take the best road trip
Route 66 in the USA connects Chicago to Los Angeles and runs through some of the country’s greatest attractions including the Grand Canyon, the Mississippi River and the Mojave Desert.
USA’s famous Route 66. Source: Supplied
9. Set foot on Antarctica
Like no place on Earth, a trip to Antarctica will take you through huge ice shelves, incredible mountain ranges and the chance to spot wildlife such as penguins and seals.
10. Ride the Trans-Siberian Railway
Travelling through China, Mongolia and Russia, the Trans-Siberian Railway is one of the world’s longest train rides, stretching more than 9000km past incredible landscapes and cities.
The Trans-Siberian Railway is one of the longest in the world. Source: Supplied
